title: GitLab security advisory (AV25-370)
description: On June 25, 2025, GitLab published a security advisory to address a vulnerability in the following products:
products: GitLab Community Edition (CE)   versions prior to 18.1.1, 18.0.3 and 17.11.5
GitLab Enterprise Edition (EE)   versions prior to 18.1.1, 18.0.3 and 17.11.5
solution: Review the references and apply the necessary updates.
